long_description: Despite their relaxed fit, the women's prAna Rylee knickers are serious when it comes to moisture-wicking performance during yoga practice or cross-training sessions. Quick-drying micropolyester fabric wicks moisture so you stay comfortable even when the yoga studio heats up; a touch of spandex improves stretch. Tunneled drawstring waist lets you personalize the fit. The women's prAna Rylee knickers feature a 15.5 in. inseam. Closeout.
short_description: Despite their relaxed fit, the women's prAna Rylee knickers are serious when it comes to moisture-wicking performance during yoga practice or cross-training sessions.
